original_title: 42nd Street Forever, Volume 4: Cooled by Refrigeration
overview: Get ready for the fourth volume of classic exploitation, horror and just plain cool trailers in Synapse Films’ best-selling compilation series. This time we’ve got alien horrors, schizoid psychos, ridiculous comedies vengeful action… and maybe a naked woman or two… all transferred in high-definition! Chill out in front of your television and relive some of the greatest coming attractions of all time!
tagline: The Most Awesome Movie Trailer Collection Of All Time Continues!
title: 42nd Street Forever, Volume 4: Cooled by Refrigeration
